title: Titanfall 2 – v2.0.11.0
body:
Titanfall 2 – v2.0.11.0


Genres/Tags: Action, Shooter, First-person, 3D
Companies: Respawn Entertainment / Electronic Arts
Languages: RUS/ENG/MULTI11
Original Size: 70.3 GB
Repack Size: from 16.7 GB [Selective Download]

 

Download Mirrors

  • 1337x | [magnet] [.torrent file only] All Languages
  • RuTor [magnet] ENG/RUS Only
  • Tapochek.net ENG/RUS Only
  • Filehoster: MultiUpload (10+ hosters, interchangeable) [Use JDownloader2]
  • Filehosters: DropArk + NitroFlare + MegaUp (Uploaded by Vikky793, not compatible with torrent)

Discussion and (possible) future updates on CS.RIN.RU thread

Screenshots (Click to enlarge)


Repack Features

  • Based on Steam v2.0.11.0 release with all languages: 70.3 GB, thanks to osb79!
  • CODEX Origin/Steam emus applied over
  • 100% Lossless & MD5 Perfect: all files are identical to originals after installation
  • NOTHING ripped, NOTHING re-encoded
  • Selective download feature: you may skip downloading and installing of multiplayer files (NO, YOU CAN’T PLAY MP IN THIS VERSION!) and language files you don’t need
  • Significantly smaller archive size (compressed from 70.3 to 16.7~23.6 GB, depending on selected components)
  • Installation takes 25-70 minutes (depending on your system and selected components)
  • After-install integrity check so you could make sure that everything installed properly
  • HDD space after installation: up to 70.3 GB
  • Use “Language Selector.exe” in game root to change the game language
  • At least 2 GB of free RAM (inc. virtual) required for installing this repack

Game Description

Call down your Titan and get ready for an exhilarating first-person shooter experience in Titanfall™ 2! The sequel introduces a new single player campaign that explores the bond between Pilot and Titan. Or blast your way through an even more innovative and intense multiplayer experience – featuring 6 new Titans, deadly new Pilot abilities, expanded customization, new maps, modes, and much more.

You can skip downloading of language packs you don’t need and multiplayer files you can’t use anyway. Here is the list of selective/optional files.

  • fg-optional-multiplayer.bin (download and install only if you need to import this repack to your legit Origin/Steam installation)
  • fg-selective-english.bin
  • fg-selective-brazilian.bin
  • fg-selective-chinese.bin
  • fg-selective-french.bin
  • fg-selective-german.bin
  • fg-selective-italian.bin
  • fg-selective-japanese.bin
  • fg-selective-mexican.bin
  • fg-selective-polish.bin
  • fg-selective-russian.bin
  • fg-selective-spanish.bin

In example, if you want to launch the game with German UI/Subtitles/Voiceovers – skip all “selective” files, but download fg-selective-german.bin & all main files (01-10).

Backwards Compatibility

Unfortunately, this repack IS NOT backwards compatible with my previous TF2 repacks.
